Lunar new year celebration

The Asian American Students Association and Chinese Students and Scholars Association will celebrate the new Year of the Horse on Friday PERIOD The celebration is open to students their families and friends as well as faculty and staff PERIOD Remember to wear red as is customary in Lunar New Year Celebrations PERIOD

Hilary Clinton ticketing

Distribution of tickets to see Hillary Clinton will begin on Monday across all campuses PERIOD Only one ticket per Cane Card will be allowed PERIOD

Student tickets for undergraduate graduate and law students on the Coral Gables campus will be distributed from the University Center Ticket Window starting at  a.m PERIOD The ticket window will be distributing tickets as long as they last PERIOD

It is open Monday through Friday  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD

Medical students at the Miller School of Medicine will receive emails from Student Government with instructions for reserving tickets for pickup at the Miller Campus PERIOD

Ticket distribution for nonemployee graduate students on the Miller Campus will begin at  a.m PERIOD at the Office of Graduate Studies located in Room  RMSB Suite  PERIOD

Graduate students at the Rosenstiel School of Marine and Atmospheric Science will be able to pickup tickets from the Graduate Student Office located in SLAB  beginning at  a.m PERIOD



New CaneIDselfserviceportal

The University of Miami Information and Technology team has redeveloped the way students can manage their CaneIDs with a new portal that will allow users to register reset security questions and change their settings manually PERIOD To use the new system visit caneid.miami.edu PERIOD



Danny Cepero may be emailed at dceperothemiamihurricane.com PERIOD

The Miami Hurricane is the student newspaper of the University of Miami in Coral Gables Florida PERIOD The newspaper is edited and produced by undergraduate students at UM and is published in print every Tuesday and online everyday during the academic year PERIOD
title: News Briefs 1/23 - The Miami Hurricane
name: University of Miami
